welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Golitsyno, Russia! Get ready to experience the charming atmosphere of this beautiful city known for its stunning architecture and rich history. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Golitsyno has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Vnukovo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights operated by low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A recently built terminal dedicated to international flights and serving as the hub for several airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'VKO Free WiFi' from the available networks and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Sheremetyevo's newest terminal, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Sheremetyevo's oldest terminal, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Sheremetyevo's largest terminal, serving a mix of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free Wi-Fi for up to 3 hours per day.
